definition: abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province

sentences.english: Put the finely chopped shallots in a pan. Add the balsamic vinegar.
sentences.chinese: 把青蔥細末放入鍋裏，加入香草醋。

sentences.english: Cut the spring onion into a few pieces. Cut the marinated salmon into slices.
sentences.chinese: 青蔥切段，醃好的三文魚切成小片狀。

sentences.english: Scallion is usually used for seasoning seafood dishes.
sentences.chinese: 青蔥常被用來佐制海鮮食品。

sentences.english: It’s made from milk, scallions and cheese.
sentences.chinese: 它是用牛奶，青蔥和奶酪一同混合而成的。

sentences.english: The green fields remember the first time went transplanting rice seedlings.
sentences.chinese: 那些青蔥蔥的田間記着查利雲第一次去田裏插秧。

sentences.english: Chili, pepper and shallot are usually necessaries in this division.
sentences.chinese: 紅辣椒，青辣椒和青蔥在這一菜系中的必備品。

sentences.english: The pancakes and the shallots taste well with the roast duck.
sentences.chinese: 薄餅和青蔥與烤鴨一起喫，正合口味。

sentences.english: Autumn disrobes the hill of verdure.
sentences.chinese: 秋天使山上青蔥的草木發黃。

sentences.english: The country is very green in spring.
sentences.chinese: 春天的時候，鄉村一片青蔥碧綠。

sentences.english: Shallot and garlic are usually used as seasonings so Shandong dishes tastes pungent usually.
sentences.chinese: 因爲使用青蔥和大蒜做爲調料，山東菜系通常很辣。

sentences.english: In a pan, to gain decolour cut shallots in hot oil.
sentences.chinese: 在潘，獲得脫色削減青蔥在熱油。

sentences.english: Can the carpet of green grass, how cover your shallot years.
sentences.chinese: 綠草如茵，怎蓋得住你的青蔥歲月。

sentences.english: They are active in exercises to remain for ever green like the pine trees.
sentences.chinese: 他們積極鍛鍊，永保青春，像松樹一樣青蔥茁壯。

sentences.english: Drain excess fat from pan, then return the pan to heat and add the shallots .
sentences.chinese: 瀝掉鍋裏多餘的油脂，放回鍋頭，加熱，加些青蔥。

sentences.english: Clean the scallions and cut into pine-nut-sized pieces.
sentences.chinese: 青蔥洗淨切成松仁大小。

definition: cabbage/CL:顆|颗[ke1],個|个[ge4]/Taiwan pr. [gao1 li4 cai4]
red pitaya/dragon fruit/dragon pearl fruit (genus Hylocereus)
